name: You Wanna Pizza Me?
description:
In the year 2042, people only eat pizza. Today, everyone orders pizza from a general hotline, and companies compete to deliver first. You are Cheezus, a pizza spy who must stop your opponents, steal their deliveries, and collect their tips! Deliver pizzas to houses to increase your score.

There’s only the little matter of all the bodies piling up… Of course, you would never step on corpses — how rude! — but really, do they have to take up this much space on the street?

Try to deliver as many pizzas as you can without getting caught by your rivals!

You Wanna Pizza Me? is an fast-paced action game made for Ludum Dare 42: "Running out of space." The original soundtrack is hosted here.


Changelog

Version 1.1
Fixed a bug that allowed players to leave the edge of the map. 


Team MERA
Design: Elowan
Programming: Alex D.
Art: Mike G.
Music: Roy Berardo

Special thanks to Tobias Do!
